txt.en: There are no birds in sight
This is not the right place to look
You are now tasked with finding the missing little bird that Oldheart longs to see safe and sound. Fangorn is a big forest...but you can see far from high places.
There are no birds in sight, but an acrid-looking fog rises from the trees beyond
This is not the right place to look

'Hm, hm.' The Ent creaks nervously, but says nothing more.

The Ent is missing his little bird-friend, and wondering whither it could have disappeared for such a long time. This seems like a good opportunity for you to go on a little birdwatching adventure.

An incredible hill stands east of Oldheart. You should be able to see quite far from atop it.

The first vantage point can be found by climbing the hill directly east of Oldheart.

You should climb the hill and <rgb=#FF0000>look</rgb> for the missing bird.

<rgb=#FF0000>This quest requires emotes. You must go to the correct location and perform the emote.</rgb>
You tell Oldheart of the acrid-looking fog you saw rising from the west behind where he stands.\n\nYou saw no birds, but perhaps this fog is worth an investigation.

The second vantage point can be found by climbing the ridge further.

You should climb further and <rgb=#FF0000>look</rgb> for the missing bird.

<rgb=#FF0000>This quest requires emotes. You must go to the correct location and perform the emote.</rgb>
Oldheart stands in his meadow below the great hill, waiting for news.\n\nYou should return to Oldheart and tell him what you saw from on high.
<rgb=#FF0000>Look</rgb> for the missing bird towards the west
<rgb=#FF0000>Look</rgb> for the missing bird towards the west
Tell Oldheart of the fog and the absence of birds
